title: "Window" means an opening other than a door, to the outside of a building which provides all or part of the required natural light, ventilation or both to an interior space
clause_text: "Window" means an opening other than a door, to the outside of a building which provides all or part of the required natural light, ventilation or both to an interior space.

source_pdf.text_snippet: "Window" means an opening other than a door, to the outside of a building which provides all or part of the required natural light, ventilation or both to an interior space.
